tasks.name: Cipher
tasks.description:
Now listen, Dipper. I have a very important mission, and you are the only one who can help me.

Flag format: donnuCTF{[a-z_]+}

tasks.name: Numeral System
tasks.description:
Yeah....That's not really helping. Maybe you can try another numeral system?

Flag format: donnuCTF{[a-zA-Z0-9_!]+}

tasks.name: Substitution Cipher
tasks.description:
It will help you: 1=2
2=5
3=1
4=6
5=4
6=3
7=11
8=9
9=7
10=8
11=10

Flag format: donnuCTF{[A-Z_]+}

tasks.name: RSA_Dream
tasks.description:
Зашифруйте фразу "меня греет только моя мечта" с помощью RSA (код прикреплен) сумма результата в стандартном виде будет флагом

Flag format: donnuctf{[a-z0-9_]+}
